title: Operation Moonlander: Inside the FBI's Takedown of a 20-Year, $46 Million Proxy Empire Built on Your Hacked Router
tags: Operation Moonlander: The Dismantling of a Decades-Long Botnet EmpireIn a significant victory against cybercrime, law enforcement agencies from the United States, the Netherlands, and Thailand have successfully dismantled a massive botnet operation that had been active for nearly two decades. Codenamed “Operation Moonlander,” this international effort led to the shutdown of two notorious proxy services—Anyproxy and 5socks—Breached CompanyBreached Company
